trans-unit.source: Azure SQL Database connectivity issues
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL Database connectivity issues

trans-unit.source: Identifying and determining SQL Database connection failures.
trans-unit.target: Identifying and determining SQL Database connection failures.

trans-unit.source: This article provides an overview on how to use various troubleshooters when you cannot connect to Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: This article provides an overview on how to use various troubleshooters when you cannot connect to Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: Use SQL Server Management Studio or SQLCMD.EXE to verify that you can connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: Use SQL Server Management Studio or SQLCMD.EXE to verify that you can connect to the database.

trans-unit.source: For directions on connecting to SQL Database with SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS), see <linkText>How to connect to an Azure SQL Database with SSMS</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For directions on connecting to SQL Database with SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS), see <linkText>How to connect to an Azure SQL Database with SSMS</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For directions on connecting to SQL Database with SQLCMD, see <linkText>How to: Connect to Azure SQL Database Using sqlcmd</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For directions on connecting to SQL Database with SQLCMD, see <linkText>How to: Connect to Azure SQL Database Using sqlcmd</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that firewall rule to allow all Azure services is enabled for the server/database.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that firewall rule to allow all Azure services is enabled for the server/database.

trans-unit.source: For information about firewall rules and enabling connections from Azure, see <linkText>Azure SQL Database Firewall</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For information about firewall rules and enabling connections from Azure, see <linkText>Azure SQL Database Firewall</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that firewall rules to allow access from specific network(s) is enabled for the server/database.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that firewall rules to allow access from specific network(s) is enabled for the server/database.

trans-unit.source: For general information about firewall rules, see <linkText>Azure SQL Database Firewall</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For general information about firewall rules, see <linkText>Azure SQL Database Firewall</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For directions on setting up firewall rules, see <linkText>How to: Configure Firewall Settings (Azure SQL Database)</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For directions on setting up firewall rules, see <linkText>How to: Configure Firewall Settings (Azure SQL Database)</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The above support article provides help for the following SQL Database connectivity issues:
trans-unit.target: The above support article provides help for the following SQL Database connectivity issues:

trans-unit.source: Cannot open server connection due to firewall settings
trans-unit.target: Cannot open server connection due to firewall settings

trans-unit.source: The server was not found or was not accessible
trans-unit.target: The server was not found or was not accessible

trans-unit.source: Unable to login to the server
trans-unit.target: Unable to login to the server

trans-unit.source: Connection timeout errors
trans-unit.target: Connection timeout errors

trans-unit.source: Transient errors
trans-unit.target: Transient errors

trans-unit.source: Connection Terminated due to hitting some system-defined limit
trans-unit.target: Connection Terminated due to hitting some system-defined limit

trans-unit.source: Connections failing from SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS)
trans-unit.target: Connections failing from SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS)

trans-unit.source: For additional information about connecting to SQL Database, see <linkText>Guidelines for Connecting to Azure SQL Database Programmatically</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about connecting to SQL Database, see <linkText>Guidelines for Connecting to Azure SQL Database Programmatically</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Details about specific connection errors can be found in the Transient faults, Connection-loss errors section in [Error messages for SQL Database client programs](sql-database-develop-error-messages.md#bkmkconnectionerrors).
trans-unit.target: Details about specific connection errors can be found in the Transient faults, Connection-loss errors section in [Error messages for SQL Database client programs](sql-database-develop-error-messages.md#bkmkconnectionerrors).

trans-unit.source: Connection event data can be accessed by querying for connectivity events using the [sys.event_log (Azure SQL Database)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn270018.aspx) view.
trans-unit.target: Connection event data can be accessed by querying for connectivity events using the [sys.event_log (Azure SQL Database)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn270018.aspx) view.

trans-unit.source: Metrics of database connectivity events can be accessed by querying the [sys.database_connection_stats (Azure SQL Database)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn269986.aspx) view.
trans-unit.target: Metrics of database connectivity events can be accessed by querying the [sys.database_connection_stats (Azure SQL Database)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn269986.aspx) view.
